Description: Gulf Coast Asphalt Company, LLC entered a plea to two counts of an information charging violations of the Oil Pollution Act and Migratory Bird Treaty Act. The charges related to an oil spill that occurred on September 1, 2011, and ultimately ended up in the Mobile River.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
